newsitem.title: FRANCE: Paris bourse cuts losses after options expiry.
newsitem.headline: Paris bourse cuts losses after options expiry.

text.p: French shares reduced their losses in late afternoon, despite a fall on Wall Street, after the expiry of May share futures and options, dealers said. Market remains nervous ahead of second-round parliamentary election vote on Sunday.
* CAC-40 index down 13.91, or 0.54 percent, at 2,565.33 at 1422 GMT
* CAC-40 total volume a high 13 billion francs
